content:
Hi.
Is there any tracking issue/ PR opened for --enable-per-target-ignores rustdoc feature?
google shows me https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/7040. I hadn't heard of the flag before today.

Already saw it. But says nothing about the flag. I opened https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/9138 and when configured correctly the feature does not work. Does not filter in respect of the ignore-some_feature attr. See: https://doc.rust-lang.org/rustdoc/unstable-features.html#--enable-per-target-ignores-allow-ignore-foo-style-filters-for-doctests

Should I assume there's no development on that? Since it gets digested as rustflag I was expecting some kind of track of it. What should be done in these cases?
